Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Your eyes are closed softly...)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: Do not rush yourself. Take your time.

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (...But you cannot open them...)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: I will be waiting for you atop the tower.

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Do you... even have eyes?)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (No... doesn't feel like you have eyes.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Everything around you feels incredibly alien, actually.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (You are floating through an endless void.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Floating seems like the right word. Void is more of a guess, really.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (It seems like this should be relaxing, but it isn't really.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Not that it's stressful, it's more... overwhelmingly neutral.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Suddenly...)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (You can feel a force pulling you!)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (Should you resist?)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (It's become too strong to resist!)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (A powerful gust blows through every aspect of your being!)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (A kinetic rush of feeling and energy overwhelms your heavy daze!)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (You can feel yourself becoming solid once again!)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (It's time to wake up.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (You come together.)

Speech.Name: Odin
Speech.Content: (You open your eyes.)
